results.title: Identification of structural features in chemicals associated with cancer drug response: a systematic data-driven analysis
results.text_hl: Furthermore, our analysis revealed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a @CHEMICAL_Cholesterol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002784 @@@cholesterol@@@-lowering drug, has a @<m>DISEASE_Leukemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007938 @@@leukemia@@@-specific response similar to a range of corticosteroids.
